channel.title: Music on ｢ALL FICTION｣
channel.description: Recent content in Music on ｢ALL FICTION｣

item.title: Music - Compositions and Production
item.description: I’ve been a guitarist for approximately 10 years, so I’ve written a song or two over the past decade. I’ve also tried engaging in music production (with little luck), and still try to learn more about it everyday and improve my mixing and mastering abilities. I still have a lot more songs to finish, if I can ever get over my writer’s block and learn how to mix drums properly. A mix I’m particularly proud of is a song called Talk by my friends' band called Paradox, which won multiple college competitions across the country while they were active.

item.title: Observation - Indian Classical Music
item.description: I’ve been a rock/metal guitarist for the past 9 or 10 years, mostly concentrating on Western music and its theory; I am by no means an expert, but I’m curious about music theory and like to learn its different applications/interpretations in various styles. I attended a Remember Shakti concert in 2012, which was my first real introduction to Indian classical musical elements. I know that it’s a fusion band, but I learnt the basic rhythmic elements during the concert thanks to my school’s guitar teacher, with whom I went to the concert (Maniche Farande, for anyone who’s interested in stalking him).
